basic_info.description: I am Juan Camilo Peña Marín, a software developer. I currently live in Colombia, I have worked with Python, Java, kotlin, html, php, sql, laravel, databases, react and different languages and tools with the ability to create innovative solutions in both the web and mobile spheres.

cv.description: Download my resume in English here

projects.title: VPN with Wireguard
projects.description: Discover how to create a VPN that allows secure connections to a private network through a server in AWS, using the Docker image for deployment. This free solution ensures data protection and communications integrity in both public and private environments.

experience.title: Customer Service and Box Office Operations at Parque del Café
description: As a Ticket Operator at the Coffee Park, I served in a variety of key roles to ensure a satisfying visitor experience. From selling tickets in the parking lot to guiding visitors to the attractions and services available, my focus was on providing friendly and efficient service. Additionally, I managed access to the park, verifying tickets and responding to visitor inquiries in a professional and courteous manner. My commitment to customer satisfaction helped maintain a welcoming and positive environment at the park.
